name: RedShift (itch) (Internal Matter)
description:
Playstore Link here.

RedShift is an arcade racing and shooting game in which you must get through 35 challenging levels. However, you are not alone and the advice that are given to you may help or not.

 
The game features
• 35 challenging levels
• A scoring system, compare your score with your friends
• A progression system with visual and gameplay modifications
• A Story that unfolds throughout the many levels
• Arcade sensations
• Boss fights
